    • Constructor Detail

      • FFDEServer

        public FFDEServer(java.lang.String aName,
                  int aKernelsPort,
                  FFDEObserver aNode)
        Creates a complete instance of an FFDENetwork.FFDEServer. Automatically initializes and reports the server to the kernel.
        Parameters:
        aName - name of the node
        aKernelsPort - port of the kernel

    • Method Detail

      • publish

        public void publish(java.lang.String aName)
        Adds a new publishing stream to the server.
        Parameters:
        aName - name of the data channel that is being published, ex. 'acc' , 'gyro' etc.

      • takeControl

        public void takeControl(java.lang.String aName)
        Takes control over the specified server and adds it to connections as a slave.
        Parameters:
        aName - name of the slave server

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(java.lang.String aPublisher,
                      java.lang.String aChannel)
        Subscribes specified data channel registered in FFDE network.
        Parameters:
        aPublisher - name of the publishing node, ex. 'kalman'
        aChannel - name of the data channel, ex. 'acc'

      • sendToSlave

        public void sendToSlave(java.lang.String aSlave,

        Sends data to the specified slave.
        Parameters:
        aSlave - name of the slave
        aData - data in form of a list of Strings

      • updateDataSubChannel

        public void updateDataSubChannel(java.lang.String aChannel,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> aMessage)
        Sends data to all servers subscribing specified data channel.
        Parameters:
        aChannel - name of the channel
        aMessage - data to be transmitted

      • waitUntilNetworkIsReady

        public void waitUntilNetworkIsReady()
        The calling thread will halt here until the network is ready to handle data transmission.

      • notifyFFDE

        public void notifyFFDE(FFDEEvent aEvent)
        Overrides notifyFFDE() from FFDENetwork.FFDEObserver interface. The server observes its dispatcher for events associated with kernel.
        Specified by:
        notifyFFDE in interface FFDEObserver
        Parameters:
        aEvent - event that triggered this method
